lyrics.text:
Ke tau fakafeta’i
Ki hotau Otua,
‘I he’ene ‘ofa lahi,
Kia kitautolu.

Mo ‘ene langa’i,
‘I he loto kovi,
‘A e feinga ke lelei
Mo ‘ene ‘Afio.

Pea fekau ia,
Ki he angahala,
‘I māmani kotoa pē,
Ke fakatomala.

Ke hoko ‘o ui,
Ki hono huafa,
‘E he kakai angakovi,
Mo e tō ki lalo.

Pea ke nau kumi,
‘A e loto tui,
Mo e fakamolemole,
‘I he’enau hia.

Mo e loto ‘ofa,
Ki hotau ‘Otua,
Pea fai talangofua,
Ki he’ene fekau.
